headerTaglines.lineTwo: I'm Mustafa Budak alias Mystik - aspiring

about.summary: I am an aspiring developer with an interest in web development. Currently, I am pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science at a university in Cologne, where I am gaining a solid foundation in programming and web development. I am eager to learn and create innovative web applications and contribute to the computer science community.
